text: <@U7SL518D6> I saw a thread from some months ago, and I have a client that asked me to create a drag and drop areas to template, is that posible now? or is that something you are still working on?

coded drag and drop email templates are not yet possible.

you can create a drag and drop email from the email tool, add in your custom modules, and clone that email as if it were a template.

I understand that’s definitely not the ideal solution, it’s just a workaround you can use while we’re still getting the full experience implemented.
